alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Grant; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 2:33PM CDT until July 09 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Grant County in central Arkansas... North central Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 233 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Thiel, or 11 miles southeast of Malvern, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leola... Prattsville... Poyen... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Thiel... Dogwood... Lono... Cross Roads in Grant County... Brush Creek... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
